---
title: "Fitbit and geomtextpath"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(geomtextpath)
library(scales)
```


```{r}
df <- read_csv('fitbit_export_20221211.csv')
```

```{r}
(df <- df %>%
  select(Date, `Minutes Sedentary`, `Minutes Lightly Active`, `Minutes Very Active`) %>% 
  gather(activity_type, val, 2:4))
```

```{r my.theme, include=TRUE}
my.theme <- theme(
  plot.title = element_text(family="Helvetica", color="black", face="bold", size=24, hjust=0), 
  plot.subtitle = element_text(family="Helvetica", color="black", size=12, hjust=0), 
  axis.title = element_text(family="Helvetica", color="black", face="bold", size=12), 
  axis.text = element_text(family="Helvetica", color="black", size=18), 
  axis.ticks.y = element_blank(), 
  plot.caption = element_text(family="Helvetica", color="black", size=12), 
  plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#F7F7F7", colour = NA),
  panel.background =  element_rect(fill = "#F7F7F7", colour = NA), 
  legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#F7F7F7", colour = NA), 
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.border = element_blank(), 
  legend.title=element_blank(), 
  legend.text = element_text(family="Helvetica", color="black", size=12, hjust=0),
  legend.position = 'top',
  strip.text = element_text(family="Helvetica", color="black", size=14))
```



```{r fig.height=3}
df %>% 
  ggplot(.,
         aes(x=Date,
             y=val,
             color=activity_type)) + 
  geomtextpath::geom_textline(aes(label=activity_type)) + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels = comma) + 
  labs(x='',
       y='Minutes') + 
  my.theme + 
  theme(legend.position = 'none')
```
